attributes.review: similar to donald trump, this app is a disgrace to humanity. absolutely disgusting i cannot believe i wasted two minutes of my life downloading this app just so i could leave this horrible review because of how much i despise trump. hi trump if you’re reading this i cannot stand you. you are ignorant, you are predatory, you are racist, you are the worst things any person could be. and if you support trump and you’re reading this you are also terrible and i cannot stand you as well. if you support a racist you are a racist. and you’re just a plain idiot if you think that trump is a good president. go cry about it❤️
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: Can’t even use the app because it wants my number. I’m afraid the developers are liberal commis and will use this information to spy on me. This isn’t the official Trump app. I’m so disappointed that this seems to be an app set up to troll those of us that support our great president. Do not download and do not enter your personal information!!!!
attributes.title: Why does it want my number?

attributes.review: I mean, really, this man is really more focused on his fans than actually helping the country. People are STILL dying because of COVID-19 in America and he’s doing nothing about it. And the fact that people still voted for him in 2016 even after he talked about the wall? How could everyone be so ignorant and racist..!? This app is just letting people ignore the actual problems with America.
attributes.title: OUR PRES IS A COWARD

attributes.review: A few days after downloading the app my information got hacked somebody tried to steal my identity. This app has you type in all of your personal information just for the information to get leaked to other users. Horrible app, not to mention it’s intentions for the purpose of getting people to vote for Trump is terrible.
attributes.title: Stole my information!!

attributes.review: not to be a karen, BUT when i opened the app, they showed a gif of winnie the pooh dying, and i was mortified so i closed the app, but then my phone gave me a notification that my phone now had the caterpillar virus and i jumped and said holy guacamole and trump himself rang on my doorbell and told me that i was dumb and his hair wasn’t real, i can’t believe that they would allow such an app to be in the app store
attributes.title: UGH

attributes.review: this app is terrible.i got it to you know 😍🧚🏻‍♀️🍄💗make america great again🥰✌🏻🧚🏻‍♀️💗. but i had so so so so SO many malfunctions. first, it took me 2 hours to get it when i had perfect wifi, when it finally downloaded there was nothing but orange faces and orange d*** pics glitching in and out. it was disgusting😡😡😡 all i have to say is, #freebarron2020 😖🥺🤭👁💧👄💧👁#kanye2020 🥰🧚🏻‍♀️💗🤠🍄

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used. Even though I have PLENTY of data and storage, when I tried download it took 2 DAYS to show up 😨😨😨. On top of that it made me phone glitch and shut down until it was finished downloading 😭. Who decided this was a good idea of an app???? It’s just like the president it’s named after, idiotic and disappointing.
attributes.title: Shut down my phone

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app rats started coming out of my air vents. And then when I deleted it they went away. Called an exterminator and he said there were no signs of rats in my house. I decided to experiment and came to this conclusion: this app is so bad the rats were embarrassed for me and came to take me out of my misery. The best decision I have ever made was deleting this app.
attributes.title: Horrible App 😡😡
